system.description:
"This little trick's started croppin' up among nobility. Ya pour a vial of gut worms into somebody's drink an let nature take its course."
-Rodolf Kazmer

After consuming the eggs, the target must make a DC: 16 Endurance check or be infested with gut worms, which lower their STA by one-quarter and have a 25% chance of causing nausea whenever they eat. The nausea can only be ended by a DC: 14 Endurance check. They must be removed with a DC: 14 Healing Hands check.
